title: Black and White
description: Thomas and Denyse have a lot in common. They both love basketball and sugar on their popcorn, but they have one major Thomas is white and Denyse is black. Some people start making racist remarks when they go out, and their parents warn them of the hardships ahead. They can't understand what the big deal is, but will the pressure of this relationship break them apart?
author: Eric Walters
